properties.title: JaxMe JAXB API: A clean room implementation of the JAXB API

section.name: JaxMe JAXB API: A clean room implementation of the JAXB API
section.p: JaxMe JAXB API is clean room implementation of the JAXB API. Unlike the reference implementation this one comes under a very moderate open source license, the Apache License 2.0.

tr.td: The reference implementation is now distributed from https://jaxb.dev.java.net/. As of this writing, it will soon be available under the GPL (GNU General Public License). Therefore, we continue to recommend our implementation.

section.p: In terms of Jar files, the JaxMe JAXB API is equivalent to the Jar file jaxb-api-2.1.jar from the reference implementation.

JaxMe JAXB API was written as a part of the JaxMe 2 project. It is available as a separate module to be included in source distributions of JAXB client applications. Perhaps other JAXB provider implementations. might be interested too at some point.
